title: I'm at 999 wins. Any Rioters Want to Play?
body:
I'm at 999 Normal SR wins. I was wondering if there are any Rioters who want to play with me for my 1000th win.

Edit: Thanks Kuujoe and Vodmor (Rcarrigan) for playing with me for my 1000th win!!

replies.body: Dat sivir carry doe
Victory!
4 rioters? Well then.
Haha, it was hard to get people linked up on the weekend after Christmas.
Oh hai
hi wanna join?
You get to play with riot when you have 999 wins???
No, but sometimes they do it by requsts to give you your 1,000th win with Riot is actually a pretty cool company.

Thanks!

For the record, I randomly saw this thread while taking a break at work. I verified his reported number of wins, and after that it was on!

One of these days...

I am going to find you guys hiding in the bushes.... 


{{summoner:4}}  "FACECHECK!"
Bravo Riot
You still on?
yea!
I'm on now, sorry about that
I'll see what I can do.
ok!
Where'd ya go?

I went to do something for my friend :(

I'll be back in 30 minutes if youre still on

> [{quoted}](name=Niqhtmare x,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=sELxuGRk,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-28T22:15:52.995+0000)
>
> I went to do something for my friend :(
> 
> I'll be back in 30 minutes if youre still on

Even Riot can wait for the....ahem...'doing something' for a friend....
Hoo boy! I have a long way to go before I even think of asking this. :D
Lol, I can't believe this got so much red attention. Hard at work.
